power.title: Battering Command
power.fluff: The slam of your weapon causes your foe to double over, enabling an ally to capitalize on the opening

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack also knocks the enemy prone.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in your warlord's aura

section.name: Effect:
section.text: After the triggering attack is resolved, the target makes a basic attack against the triggering enemy.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: The target can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier before making the attack.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: The target gainst temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. If the target is bloodied, he or she 5 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points instead.

power.title: Bloody Ending
power.fluff: You guide your allies to finish off a wounded foe

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you and allies in your warlord's aura gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and and score critical hits on a natural roll of 19 or 20 against bloodied enemies.
If you hit a bloodied enemy with an attack, the bonus increases to +2.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: You and allies the aura also gain a bonus to AC against bloodied enemies. The bonus equals one-half your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: You and allies can choose to have combat advantage instead of scoring critical hits on a natural roll of 19 or 20.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: You and allies also gain a power bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Deadly Distraction
power.fluff: You strike your foe hard, delivering a wound that keeps them distracted while you and your allies reposition

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee or ranged attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] additional damage, or +1d8 additional damage if it isn't a Weapon attack.
Until the end of your next turn, while the triggering enemy remains in your warlord's aura, it cannot trigger actions based you and your allies' movement.

power.title: Devastating Setup
power.fluff: You knock the enemy aside and call forth a nearby ally to capitulate

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the tactician's command class power.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature adjacent to you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You either slide the primary target 1 square, or push it up to 3 squares.
You then use your tactician's command and must choose the target as the target enemy.

section.name: Inspiring Presence:
section.text: If the target ally hits, he or she can end one effect on himself or herself that a save can end. If the target ally has no effect that a save can end, he or she can attempt a saving throw against one effect that doesn't normally end on a save.

section.name: Resourceful Presence:
section.text: The target ally's attack hits, the target enemy takes a penalty to its first attack's attack rolls equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Skirmishing Presence:
section.text: The target ally can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier before making the attack.

section.name: Tactical Presence:
section.text: The target ally's attack deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
